sentence.text: This sleep can be quite prolonged ; my own son , when he was three , awoke screaming in the early hours one night with a very high fever and typical picture of Belladonna .
He awoke early after a disturbed sleep .
She awoke early , took a shower , went to her study and tried to work .
The next morning I awoke early and tidied myself for school .
I awoke some hours later and , feeling refreshed , went out to explore Galway .
Tom awoke late and came downstairs to find a plate of bacon and eggs kept warm in the oven , and a flurry of domestic activity already in progress .
When he awoke a few seconds later , David felt exhausted .
He fell asleep , but the pains in his head were still there when he awoke in the morning .
Shannon awoke the following morning still wrapped in Dane 's arms , and contentment washed over her in a warm wave .
I awoke in the morning completely refreshed after ten hours of uninterrupted sleep .
She awoke instantly and stood up .
Fergus awoke suddenly ; arms waving about , eyes wild and bright , making no sound other than a faint gurgling noise .
I awoke at dawn certain that I should go home .
I awoke at the sounding of five o'clock reveille , shivering in the bitter cold .
Nigel Lawson awoke at the start of the Conservative Party conference to find himself described as ` This Bankrupt Chancellor " on the front page of the Daily Mail .
Suddenly she awoke from her dream to noise and violent movement .
Benny awoke from a dream of Daleks and childhood memories to find herself rocking gently with the motion of a boat .
John awoke from a shallow , fitful sleep and lay listening to the wind moaning forlornly through the shutters of his room .
Anna Charsky awoke in the bedroom of her pleasant flat overlooking an historic river .
I awoke in the soundproofed luxury of the Princess Grace Hospital , none the worse for the two-hour operation .
I awoke in the middle of the night with a pain in the back of my neck and a beating headache .
He awoke in hazy sunshine , his head clear , the room freezing in the light of a fresh morning .
On Sunday morning Rachel awoke to bright autumn sunshine and clear blue skies .
I awoke to the sound of running water in the bathroom .
Melissa slept late and awoke with a splitting headache .
The man awoke with a start .
Rex awoke with a start in the back seat of Bill 's cab .
Lancaster Gate awoke on Monday to find itself accused of doing nothing almost before it had had time to consider doing anything .
Mrs Naulls awoke as easily as she slept .
The next morning I awoke anxious over what had happened .
